amendment.description: Amendment designates $1 million for operations and grants affiliated with the National Underground Railroad Network to Freedom.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in the Congressional Record to redirect $1,000,000 in funding for Administrative Provisions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Hastings (FL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
